name: Bitvore
desc: Nearly 100 banks and asset managers rely on Bitvore's precise intelligence on changes in companies across sectors, both public and private. Data normalized and enhanced with specific entities involved, type of change detected, geolocation, company firmagraphics and sentiment. Continuously updated from in-depth NLP analysis of 300,000 global news, blog and information sources including SEC and MSRB. Deduplicated, timestamped and indexed by company, sector, size, and location. Datasets indexed by ticker and CUSIP when applicable. Historical data available, depending on dataset, for up to 4 years. Datasets are available through APIs for interactive queries including the creation and management of custom portfolios. All data includes links to original source.
main_data_source: Geo-location, Public Data, Social/Sentiment, Web Data
full_ticker_coverage: All public companies traded on US stock exchanges
full_sector_coverage: Multiple datasets that cover companies over $50M in revenue, public and private plus public finance sector.
sectors: Agriculture, Airlines, Autos, Construction, Consumer, Energy, Financial Services, Healthcare, Industrials, Insurance, Internet, Media, Real Estate, Retail, Telecom
data_delivery: Platform Based,Custom Analysis,Multiple APIs available to access and manage live datastreams.
pricing_structure: Pricing depends on the dataset requested. Datasets are live and updated daily or intra-day.
why_us?: Ready-to-use accurate, deduplicated, normalized intelligence on corporations.
advantages: Comprehensive, accurate, deduplicated and normalized. Specialized for material changes impacting to specific corporations and public sector entities. Unique IDs assigned to each company allow direct integration with other data sets, portfolio management, CRM, AML, KYC and vendor management systems.
use_cases: Portfolio management, risk management, commercial lending, sales territory intelligence, predictive analytics, and KYC/KYV.
